title: Is the new USB-C Ethernet adapter 4 Chromecast with Google TV compatible with the Pixel3 or Pixel4?
content:
I'm trying to connect a Pixel3 or Pixel4a(5G) to the internet using an ethernet adapter.  Does the USB-C Ethernet adapter for Chromecast with Google TV work with the pixel series of phones?

The wifi on the second floor is spotty and I was looking for a work around to ensure a consistent internet connection.
